```{r Clear memory and setup}
rm(list=ls())
options(scipen=999)
```

```{r Load Packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r Load Data}
odi1 <- read.csv("../Input/ODI/ODI_1996-2001.csv")
odi2 <- read.csv("../Input/ODI/ODI_2002-2011.csv")
```

```{r Change variable names to match}
odi1 <- odi1 %>% rename(EMP_Q1 = Q1,
                        HOURS_Q2 = Q2,
                        UNUSUAL_Q3 = Q3A,
                        STRIKE_Q3 = Q3B,
                        SHUT_Q3 = Q3C,
                        SEASONAL_Q3 = Q3D,
                        DISASTER_Q3 = Q3E,
                        SHORT_Q3 = Q3F,
                        LONG_Q3 = Q3G,
                        OREASON_Q3 = Q3H,
                        )
```
